title: Royal Space Force: The Wings of Honnêamise
description: A young man dreams of becoming an astronaut in a militaristic society.

title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water: The Motion Picture
description: A young inventor and a mysterious girl embark on an adventure to uncover the secrets of a mystical blue stone.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Death & Rebirth
description: A recap of the Neon Genesis Evangelion series, leading into new material.

title: The End of Evangelion
description: An alternate ending to the Neon Genesis Evangelion series.

title: Revival of Evangelion
description: A compilation of 'Death (True)²' and 'The End of Evangelion'.

title: Gunbuster vs. Diebuster Aim for the Top!
description: A compilation film combining the Gunbuster and Diebuster series.

title: Gurren Lagann The Movie: Childhood's End
description: A retelling of the first half of the Gurren Lagann series.

title: Gurren Lagann The Movie: The Lights in the Sky are Stars
description: A retelling of the second half of the Gurren Lagann series.

title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
description: An adventure series inspired by Jules Verne's works, following a young inventor and a mysterious girl named Nadia.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: A groundbreaking mecha series that delves into psychological and philosophical themes as teenagers pilot giant robots to protect humanity.

title: His and Her Circumstances (Kare Kano)
description: A romantic comedy exploring the relationship between two high-achieving high school students who discover each other's hidden vulnerabilities.

title: Oruchuban Ebichu
description: A comedic series about a housekeeping hamster named Ebichu and her often inappropriate adventures.

title: Mahoromatic
description: A sci-fi romantic comedy about a combat android who retires to become a maid for a teenage boy.

title: Magical Shopping Arcade Abenobashi
description: A fantasy adventure where two childhood friends are transported to various parallel worlds, each parodying different genres.

title: Petite Princess Yucie
description: A magical girl series following Yucie, a 17-year-old stuck in a 10-year-old's body, as she strives to become the Platinum Princess.

title: This Ugly yet Beautiful World
description: A sci-fi romance exploring the relationship between a high school boy and a mysterious girl who appears in a flash of light.

title: He Is My Master
description: A comedy about two runaway sisters who become maids for a perverted teenage millionaire.

title: Gurren Lagann
description: An action-packed mecha series that follows humanity's fight for freedom against oppressive rulers in a spiral-themed universe.

title: Corpse Princess (Shikabane Hime)
description: A supernatural action series about a deceased girl who must kill 108 undead beings to gain entry into heaven.

title: Hanamaru Kindergarten
description: A slice-of-life comedy focusing on the daily lives of kindergarten children and their teachers.

title: Panty & Stocking with Garterbelt
description: A raunchy action-comedy featuring two angel sisters combating evil spirits in a unique animation style.

title: The Mystic Archives of Dantalian
description: A mystery series centered on a young man who inherits a library of magical books and partners with a girl to solve supernatural cases.

title: Medaka Box
description: A school-based action series following a high-achieving student council president with extraordinary abilities.

title: Stella Women's Academy, High School Division Class C³
description: A slice-of-life series about a high school club dedicated to airsoft gun battles.

title: Wish Upon the Pleiades
description: A collaboration with Subaru, this magical girl series follows a group of girls collecting engine fragments for an alien spacecraft.

title: Magica Wars
description: A media franchise where each magical girl represents one of Japan's 47 prefectures, battling impurities known as Magatsuhi.

title: Gunbuster (Top o Nerae!)
description: A six-episode OVA series following a young pilot selected to pilot a gigantic robot as a key point of Earth's defense during a space war.

title: Otaku no Video
description: A two-episode OVA that blends animation and live-action segments, providing a satirical look at the life of otaku and the rise of Gainax itself.

title: FLCL (Fooly Cooly)
description: A six-episode OVA series that tells the story of a 12-year-old boy whose life is turned upside down by a mysterious woman wielding a guitar.

title: Re: Cutie Honey
description: A three-episode OVA co-produced with Toei Animation, reimagining the classic 'Cutie Honey' series with modern animation and storytelling.

title: Diebuster (Top o Nerae 2!)
description: A six-episode OVA series and the sequel to 'Gunbuster,' following a new protagonist in a distant future setting.

title: Mahoromatic: I'm Home!
description: A two-episode OVA that serves as an epilogue to the 'Mahoromatic' TV series, providing additional insights into the characters' lives.

title: Wish Upon the Pleiades (OVA)
description: A four-episode ONA co-produced with Subaru, featuring a group of magical girls on a quest to collect engine fragments for an alien spacecraft.

title: Aoki Uru: Overture
description: A short film serving as a prologue to the planned 'Aoki Uru' movie, showcasing the project's animation style and themes.

title: Blazing Transfer Student
description: A two-episode OVA about a transfer student who fights his way through a high school where battles determine everything.

title: Money Wars
description: A single-episode OVA focusing on financial schemes and corporate battles in the high-stakes world of business.
